item.title: DeepSeek 下跌后华尔街关注英伟达股价关键水平
item.description: 在华尔街，所有的目光都聚焦在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的股票上，图表观察家们正在寻找这家芯片制造巨头将重拾涨势的迹象，因为它具有左右大盘的力量。【原文：On Wall Street, all eyes are on Nvidia Corp.’s stock as chart-watchers search for signs the chipmaking giant will resume a rally, given its power to sway the broader market.】

item.title: 稳定币发行商 Tether 称去年利润为 130 亿美元
item.description: Tether Holdings Ltd.是一家稳定币发行商，本周在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）竞选商务部部长的确认听证会上成为焦点。【原文：Tether Holdings Ltd., the stablecoin issuer that was pulled into the spotlight this week during the confirmation hearing for Donald Trump’s pick to run the Commerce Department, said it made an eye-popping $13 billion in profits last year.】

item.title: 联合利华考虑将美国作为冰淇淋业务的潜在上市地点

item.title: 特朗普关税临近，全球为股市溢出做好准备
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划在周六对来自加拿大和墨西哥的商品征收 25% 的关税。现在，人们开始猜测这些关税将如何影响全球股市。【原文：US President Donald Trump is planning to slap 25% tariffs on goods from Canada and Mexico on Saturday. Now comes the guessing game on how they will affect the global stock market.】

item.title: 加拿大屏蔽元新闻。诈骗广告取而代之

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称进一步宽松政策方向明确
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行进一步放宽政策的方向是 "明确的"，因为欧洲央行正在努力使通胀率在夏季之前可持续地达到2%的目标，而经济增长却令人失望。【原文：The European Central Bank’s direction toward further easing policy is “clear” as it’s on course to bring inflation to its 2% target sustainably by the summer and economic growth has disappointed, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: Meta积极押注人工智能，股价创2015年以来最长涨幅
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司的股价有望创下近十年来最长的连续日涨幅，其最新财报增强了投资者对其人工智能战略的信心。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. shares are on track for their longest streak of daily gains in almost a decade, with its latest earnings report adding to investor confidence about its strategy with artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 巴西亿万富翁考虑收购法国维拉利亚公司
item.description: 巴西亿万富翁莫雷拉-萨雷斯（Moreira Salles）家族正在探索对 Verallia SA 的潜在私有化收购，因为这家法国包装公司的股价暴跌。【原文：Brazil’s billionaire Moreira Salles family is exploring a potential take-private bid for Verallia SA amid a plunge in the French packaging company’s shares, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比称赞通胀进展但支持放缓步伐
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）称赞了最新的通胀数据，并补充说，随着物价增长放缓，降低利率是合适的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee praised the latest inflation data, adding it’s appropriate to lower interest rates as price growth slows.】

item.title: Centerview 重聘 Emlen Fischer 为电池初创公司合伙人

item.title: 卡尼承诺取消碳税后，加拿大碳税似乎已夭折
item.description: 在接替总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）担任自由党领袖的两位主要竞争者都承诺取消加拿大对消费者燃料征收的全国碳税之后，加拿大的全国碳税很可能已进入最后几周。【原文：Canada’s national carbon tax on consumer fuels is likely in its final weeks after both major contenders to replace Prime Minister Justin Trudeau as Liberal leader have promised to scrap it.】

item.title: 墨西哥警告特朗普25%的关税将是 "战略错误
item.description: 墨西哥政府告诉唐纳德-特朗普，他对墨西哥商品征收 25% 关税的计划将是一个错误，会增加美国消费者的成本。【原文：Mexico’s government told Donald Trump that his plan to place 25% tariffs on its goods would be a mistake that raises costs for US consumers, a day after he renewed his pledge to impose them on Saturday.】

item.title: 结称赞欧洲央行在不影响就业的情况下抑制物价方面取得进展

item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，作为 2023 年批准的重组计划的一部分，钢铁制造商 Celsa 集团已启动了向一家西班牙投资者出售多达 20% 股份的程序。【原文：Steelmaker Celsa Group has kicked off a process to sell a stake of as much as 20% to a Spanish investor as part of a restructuring plan approved in 2023, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Old Mutual 首席执行官认为中美之争给非洲带来了一线希望
item.description: 如果美国和中国这两个世界头号经济大国开始不得不从其他地方进口，那么中美之间的贸易战可能会给非洲的出口商带来一线希望。【原文：A trade war between the US and China could prove a silver lining for Africa’s exporters if the world’s two top economic powers start having to import from elsewhere.】

item.title: 人工智能部长表示，使用 DeepSeek 的英国人应警惕风险
item.description: 英国人工智能大臣费雷尔-克拉克（Feryal Clark）表示，使用中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 聊天机器人的英国人应警惕其个人数据面临的风险。【原文：Britons using a chatbot from Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek should be alert to the risk to their personal data, the UK’s AI minister Feryal Clark said.】

item.title: 被动投资时代，"神奇 "高效市场理论遭抨击
item.description: 乍一看，本周的股票交易很难说是市场效率理论的典范，而市场效率理论是《经济学 101》中经常被浪漫化的理念。毕竟，受一周前发布的人工智能模型的担忧刺激，大型股票指数在周一暴跌，随后迅速反弹。【原文：At first blush, stock trading this week is hardly a paragon of the market-efficiency theory, an oft-romanticized idea in Economics 101. After all, big equity gauges plunged on Monday, spurred by fears of an AI model released a week earlier, before swiftly rebounding.】

item.title: 贸易商在飞往美国的飞机上装载黄金和白银，押注关税
item.description: 在过去的几个月里，从伦敦到纽约的商业航班的货舱里不断出现密封的木箱，它们被捆绑得严严实实，以防被篡改。当它们降落在美国本土时，就会被卡车收走，而卡车司机一般都不知道他们运的是什么。【原文：Over the last few months, sealed wooden boxes have been arriving in the holds of commercial flights from London to New York, strapped up and tightly packed against tampering. When they land stateside, they are collected by trucks whose drivers, generally, don’t know what they’re hauling.】
